title: Pocket Realms 将于今年晚些时候发布
author: LeoPro
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2016-2-19 18:57 编辑 






292px-Minecraft_Realms_Logo.png (18.02 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2016-2-19 14:37 上传







Minecraft Wiki：
（携带版未来展望）
“携带版领域”
Minecraft Realms for the Pocket Edition was available as a trial, but was later removed. It was planned to be added again in Alpha 0.9.1 however was delayed for unknown reasons.

When it was mentioned at MineCon 2015, the response was that it should be in this year. When it was mentioned in the Pocket Edition Q&A Lifestream ,it was stated that Shoghi was working on authentication and it should be coming soon. On January 3, 2016, Marc Watson confirmed that Pocket Realms would be released later this year.
Minecraft 携带版的 Realms 曾经作为一个试验，但是后来被移除了。它计划在 Alpha 0.9.1 中被再次加入，但是由于未知的原因而延迟了。

当它在MineCon 2015被提及时，回答是它将在这一年发布。当它在携带版问答直播被提及时，它说 Shoghi 正在进行认证工作，应该很快就会到来。在2016年1月3日，Marc Watson 证实了 Pocket Realms 将于今年晚些时候发布。

以上翻译如果有误请指出，欢迎修改意见。


【注】在携带版中，玩家开始可以通过Pocket Realms进行多人游戏，但在Alpha 0.7.6 Pocket Realms 被关闭。
